shortdesc.p: Welcome to MOVO! Read this section first to get started.

shortdesc.p: This section describes the contents of the box in which MOVO arrives.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the contents of the box in which MOVO arrives.

shortdesc.p: This section gives a description of the process for removing MOVO from the shipping container.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section gives a description of the process for removing MOVO from the shipping container.

shortdesc.p: This section describes how to flip the battery breaker on the base. This is required in order for the batteries to be charged, and for MOVO to operate without being plugged in.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes how to flip the battery breaker on the base. This is required in order for the batteries to be charged, and for MOVO to operate without being plugged in.

shortdesc.p: This section describes the procedure to charge MOVO's battery. MOVO's batteries need to be charged regularly.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the procedure to charge MOVO's battery. MOVO's batteries need to be charged regularly.

shortdesc.p: Here's where to turn for MOVO-related support and advice.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Here's where to turn for MOVO-related support and advice.

topic.title: Personal safety and security of MOVO

shortdesc.p: This section covers key information and principles to follow to avoid personal injury or damage to MOVO.

topicmeta.navtitle: Personal safety and security of MOVO
topicmeta.linktext: Personal safety and security of MOVO
topicmeta.shortdesc: This section covers key information and principles to follow to avoid personal injury or damage to MOVO.

shortdesc.p: This section describes the intended usage of MOVO.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the intended usage of MOVO.

shortdesc.p: This section describes the proper environmental operating conditions for MOVO. Make sure not to use MOVO outside the proper range of conditions.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the proper environmental operating conditions for MOVO. Make sure not to use MOVO outside the proper range of conditions.

shortdesc.p: This section describes the use of the E-Stop. The E-Stop lets you stop MOVO quickly in an emergency.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the use of the E-Stop. The E-Stop lets you stop MOVO quickly in an emergency.

shortdesc.p: This section describes steps to take to avoid potential damage to MOVO. Most of this is common sense, but it's good to keep in mind.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes steps to take to avoid potential damage to MOVO. Most of this is common sense, but it's good to keep in mind.

shortdesc.p: This section describes some basic steps to take to avoid potential injury to researchers and bystanders when operating MOVO.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes some basic steps to take to avoid potential injury to researchers and bystanders when operating MOVO.

shortdesc.p: This section provides a quick description of the basic components of MOVO

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section provides a quick description of the basic components of MOVO

shortdesc.p: This section describes the Human-Machine Interface (HMI) panel, located on the rear of the upper torso.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the Human-Machine Interface (HMI) panel, located on the rear of the upper torso.

shortdesc.p: This section describes the charging port used to connect MOVO to its power supply and the indicators that display the charging state.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the charging port used to connect MOVO to its power supply and the indicators that display the charging state.

shortdesc.p: This section describes the LED status indicators on the right hand side of the motion base of MOVO.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the LED status indicators on the right hand side of the motion base of MOVO.

shortdesc.p: This section describes the joystick used for remote tele-operation of MOVO and the control mapping for the joystick.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the joystick used for remote tele-operation of MOVO and the control mapping for the joystick.

shortdesc.p: This section describes the procedure for powering up MOVO. This is carried out every time you turn MOVO on.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the procedure for powering up MOVO. This is carried out every time you turn MOVO on.

shortdesc.p: This section describes the internal bootup process that takes place when MOVO is powered on.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the internal bootup process that takes place when MOVO is powered on.

shortdesc.p: This section describes the upstart process that is launched by the boot-up process on powering up MOVO.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the upstart process that is launched by the boot-up process on powering up MOVO.

shortdesc.p: This section describes the procedure for an orderly shut down of MOVO. This is used whenever it is necessary to shut down and put away MOVO when not in use.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the procedure for an orderly shut down of MOVO. This is used whenever it is necessary to shut down and put away MOVO when not in use.

shortdesc.p: Describes the internal process when MOVO is shut down.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Describes the internal process when MOVO is shut down.

topic.title: Working with JACO arms and MOVO

shortdesc.p: This section describes how to perform procedures relating to removing and installing JACO2 arms from and on MOVO.

topicmeta.navtitle: Working with JACO arms and MOVO
topicmeta.linktext: Working with JACO arms and MOVO
topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes how to perform procedures relating to removing and installing JACO2 arms from and on MOVO.

topic.title: Disconnect JACO arm from standard controller base

shortdesc.p: This page describes how to disconnect a JACO arm from a standard JACO controller base. This is necessary to prepare an arm to be mounted on MOVO.

topicmeta.navtitle: Disconnect JACO arm from standard controller base
topicmeta.linktext: Disconnect JACO arm from standard controller base
topicmeta.shortdesc: This page describes how to disconnect a JACO arm from a standard JACO controller base. This is necessary to prepare an arm to be mounted on MOVO.

shortdesc.p: This section describes the process of installing Kinova arms on MOVO. This applies whether you are putting the arms on for the first time, or if you are putting the arms back on after removing them.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the process of installing Kinova arms on MOVO. This applies whether you are putting the arms on for the first time, or if you are putting the arms back on after removing them.

shortdesc.p: This section describes the procedure for removing one Kinova arm from MOVO. This can be helpful if you want to experiment with the arm separately for research purposes.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the procedure for removing one Kinova arm from MOVO. This can be helpful if you want to experiment with the arm separately for research purposes.

topic.title: Mounting JACO arm on standard controller base

shortdesc.p: This page describes how to mount a JACO arm on a standard JACO controller base.

topicmeta.navtitle: Mounting JACO arm on standard controller base
topicmeta.linktext: Mounting JACO arm on standard controller base
topicmeta.shortdesc: This page describes how to mount a JACO arm on a standard JACO controller base.

shortdesc.p: This section describes the procedure for packing up MOVO into its shipping container. This is useful if you ever need to ship or transport MOVO.

topicmeta.shortdesc: This section describes the procedure for packing up MOVO into its shipping container. This is useful if you ever need to ship or transport MOVO.
